channel.title: 3D-gaussian on MILAI AI
channel.description: Recent content in 3D-gaussian on MILAI AI

item.title: gaussian_splatting
item.description: Install Cuda: 12.2 conda env; conda create -n gaussian_splatting python=3.8 conda activate gaussian_splatting pip3 install torch torchvision torchaudio pip3 install plyfile tqdm pillow pip3 install submodules/diff-gaussian-rasterization pip3 install submodules/simple-knn
